players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm the mafioso. Be cautious, Charlie is the detective."
You: "Bob, we need to work together. Charlie, can you investigate anyone?"
Charlie: "Alice, I'll investigate you tonight. Stay vigilant, Bob."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie confirmed I'm the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie, watch Diana. I'm clean. Vote wisely."
You: "Charlie, investigate Bob next. He seemed suspicious last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the mafioso. Be cautious, Charlie is the detective."
Alice: "Bob, we need to work together. Charlie, can you investigate anyone?"
Charlie: "Alice, I'll investigate you tonight. Stay vigilant, Bob."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob. Charlie confirmed I'm the mafioso."
You: "Charlie, watch Diana. I'm clean. Vote wisely."
Alice: "Charlie, investigate Bob next. He seemed suspicious last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
